metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010083 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: The Pallets Project Flask before 1.0 is affected by: unexpected memory usage. The impact is: denial of service. The attack vector is: crafted encoded JSON data. The fixed version is: 1. NOTE: this may overlap CVE-2018-1000656.

criterions.comment: flask: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
